BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 20th MAY, 1916,1C'1* The number of prisoners captured by the French in their operation V*fof KSMMEL Hill exceeds 500.The attack was on a 2^000 yards front and all objectives, which were strictly limited, were gained.2, There was considerable bombing of our back areas last night by hostile, aeroplanes. It is reported that A3A3.T0CQRT junction was subjected to particularly severe bombing but that the damage done is insignificant.3* There has been considerable air and artillery activity to-day.4. The general situation remains unchanged.General Staff,War Office, S*WVU / -- ry.- -m20th May, 1918.Issued at 6*15 p.m.
